nodes.text: Foga Brill was an individual who worked for the Galactic Republic Judicial Department's Office of Criminal Investigations. During the Clone Wars between the Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems, Brill served as the office's Director of Investigation.

Foga Brill was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Foga Brill was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the character was first mentioned in the 1996 novel Shield of Lies, authored by Michael P. Kube-McDowell.
